captions.text: Hi, how are you doing?! I am Otário (Sucker)!
And today I'm here to congratulate Correios by censoring my video.
But how dumb you are, huh?!

Instead of refuting the criticism I've made,
the Correios prefered to censor
And they got a warrant on justice against Google for the remotion of my video on Youtube.
However, as I'm not breaking any terms of use of the network...
This censorship was made only on Brazilian Youtube.
Wooow, that's coooool!
And observe that YouTube is quite annoying with copyright issues, brands and so on
Moreover, it's because of these restrictions that I modify the logo of every company that I mention
Correios, don't fuck with me!

Unfortunately, I'm just an ordinary citizen,
and I can't hire a good

lawyer office to fight for me
at Justice...

otherwise, I would do it with
pleasure...

'cause they may even have my money,
but not my dignity.

Therefore, if u want to upload the video all over the Internet... 
feel free to do it!
Just check the download link that is on the description.
Yeah... Censure a  person is easy...
... I wanna see them censoring the whole internet?!
Buh
Correios, with this attitude you're helping to create a super hero!
And with powers far beyond Youtube

And observe that I even had forgotten 
this video.
Yo Correios, Dick in Your Ass!
[ Translation - Vitor Utrila ]
